host_filter.description: Filter all incoming events for host. Hosts have to existing before using this provider

min_tls_version.description: Minimum TLS Version used to connect to the cluster - allowed values are SSL3.0, TLS1.0, TLS1.1, TLS1.2. Applies only when useSSL is enabled

root_ca.description: Use root CA to connect to Cluster. Applies only when useSSL is enabled

use_ssl.description: Use SSL when connecting to cluster

function_name.description: keyspace qualifier to the resource, only applicable for resource all functions in keyspace, function, keyspace, table

grantee.description: role name who we are granting privilege(s) to

keyspace_name.description: keyspace qualifier to the resource, only applicable for resource all functions in keyspace, function, keyspace, table

mbean_name.description: name of mbean, only applicable for resource mbean

mbean_pattern.description: pattern for selecting mbeans, only valid for resource mbeans

privilege.description: One of select, create, alter, drop, modify, authorize, describe, execute

resource_type.description: Resource type we are granting privilege to. Must be one of all functions, all functions in keyspace, function, all keyspaces, keyspace, table, all roles, role, roles, mbean, mbeans, all mbeans

role_name.description: name of the role, applicable only for resource role

table_name.description: name of the table, applicable only for resource table

durable_writes.description: Enable or disable durable writes - disabling is not recommended

replication_strategy.description: Keyspace replication strategy - must be one of SimpleStrategy or NetworkTopologyStrategy

strategy_options.description: strategy options used with replication strategy

login.description: Enables role to be able to login

name.description: Name of role - must contain between 1 and 256 characters

password.description: Password for user when using Cassandra internal authentication

super_user.description: Allow role to create and manage other roles
